        Person constructor
        Parameters:
        name - Persons name string
        race - Persons race string
        health - current health amount
        maxHealth - maximum health
        vigour - current tiredness level
        maxVigour - maximum tiredness level
        hunger - current hunger
        maxHunger - maximum hunger
        maxActions - maximum actions
        currentActions - current amount of actions
        repairValue - repair ability modifier
        searchValue - search ability modifier
        hasPlague - boolean person has plague
        unique - int unique identifier

        public boolean decreaseHealth​(int decrease)
        Damages persons health by the decrease amount, kills person if health falls below 0
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true if damage results in death, false otherwise

      • kill

        public void kill()

      • attemptSleepOrEat

        public boolean attemptSleepOrEat()
        Separate attempt action for sleeping and eating food. Can sleep or eat when tired or hungry, at no cost to hunger or vigour
        Returns:
        boolean enough action points to sleep or eat

      • tiredOrHungryCheck

        public boolean tiredOrHungryCheck()
        Checks if person is too tired or hungry to perform the action
        Returns:
        true if not tired or hungry, false otherwise

        Parameters:
        rand - Random number generator object
        Returns:
        true if can find piece, false otherwise

      • failedAction

        public java.lang.String failedAction()
        Reports why the action failed. Either too tired or not enough action points
        Returns:
        String explaining why action failed

      • plagueSickness

        public java.lang.String plagueSickness()
        Plague sickness damages health by 30 at the end of each day
        Returns:
        String person name and health lost

      • endDayChanges

        public java.lang.String endDayChanges()
        Performs end of day changes for person. Makes hungry and tired, refreshes action points and applies plague sickness
        Returns:

      • setLabelledDead

        Sets labeled dead boolean to true if death has been reported to log
